title: PixelForge
extendedDescription: PixelForge is a comprehensive web-based platform developed for Digital Image Processing coursework. Built with React and leveraging HTML5 Canvas, it provides an interactive environment to perform advanced image manipulations, transformations, and analysis.

features.name: Image Operations
features.description: Multi-format image support with arithmetic and logical operations.

features.name: Enhancement
features.description: Image enhancement with histogram equalization, gamma correction, and filtering techniques.

features.name: Segmentation
features.description: Edge detection, thresholding, and region-based segmentation.
